hero.greeting: Hello, I'm Luis Felipe Tavera Orozco
hero.description: With over 8 years of experience building robust, scalable, and efficient software solutions. My passion is transforming complex ideas into intuitive and powerful applications using technologies like .Net, React, and Angular.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I am a developer focused on quality and best practices. I firmly believe that good software should not only work, but also be maintainable and scalable. That's why I apply design patterns, clean architectures, and SOLID principles in every project I lead or participate in. My goal is always to deliver real value through clean and well-structured code.
about.paragraph2: I consider myself a lifelong learner, always exploring new technologies and methodologies to improve my skills. I enjoy technical challenges and collaborating in dynamic teams to achieve common goals. Currently, I contribute my experience to the Flyr team, where I help develop innovative solutions.

job1.description: Development and maintenance of critical applications for the aviation sector, using a modern technology stack based on .Net and React. I collaborate in defining architectures and implementing new features, ensuring system performance and scalability.

job2.description: I participated in the development of software solutions for airlines, focusing on reservation and passenger management systems. I implemented complex integrations and worked on optimizing key business processes.

job3.description: I contributed to the development of internal information systems for academic and administrative management, improving the efficiency of university processes through technology.

job4.description: I was responsible for developing components and features for project management software products, working mainly with .Net technologies in an agile environment.

project1.description: A RESTful API developed in .NET Core that integrates Microsoft Azure's facial recognition services. It allows managing, training, and recognizing faces through secure and efficient endpoints.

project2.description: A personal project to explore the power of Google Chrome APIs. This extension demonstrates how to interact with the browser's native functionalities, such as tab management, storage, and notifications.

project3.description: A project as part of a programming contest to simulate banking operations.
